output: word_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
setwd("C:/aaaWork/Web/GitHub/NCMTH107/Year_Specific/F18")
d <- readxl::read_excel("MTH107_F18_emails.xlsx") %>%
  filter(Example=="yes") %>%
  rename(sender=`From: (Name)`,body=Body) %>%
  select(-Subject,-Example)

nms <- unique(d$sender)

d <- mutate(d,sender=plyr::mapvalues(sender,from=nms,
                     to=paste0("Student #",1:length(nms))))
d$body <- gsub("[\r\r]","",d$body)
d$body <- gsub(" [\n]","\n",d$body)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
out <- NULL
for (i in 1:nrow(d)) {
  out <- paste(out,"---\n\n")
  out <- paste(out,"From",d$sender[i],"\n\n")
  out <- paste(out,d$body[i],"\n\n")
}
```

`r out`
